comment._content: Mwanga II Basammula-Ekkere (died in 1908), ruler of Buganda, 1884-97

comment.author: 26227071@N03
comment._content: Thus those two images should be under Uganda, but the other two images?

comment.author: 71034505@N06
comment._content: These pictures was taken when Mwanga & Kabarega were being taken into exile in the Seychelles so could have been taken in the EAP. As all the other pictures in the album appear to be Mombasa I supect that this is where these were taken.
